headline: Here's Why Amphenol Stock Is a Buy Even With a Higher P/E of 29.36X
summary: APH's premium P/E doesn't stop shares from surging, as AI datacom demand, defense strength and upbeat 2026 guidance support the buy case.

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Amphenol Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Amphenol has notably outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are highly optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Vishay Intertechnology Stock Falls 4% as Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates
summary: VSH shares slide 4% after Q4 earnings lag estimates despite revenues beating expectations and rising 12% year over year.

headline: Amphenol Announces First Quarter 2026 Dividend
summary: WALLINGFORD, Conn., February 05, 2026--Amphenol Corporation (NYSE: APH) announced today that its Board of Directors approved the first quarter 2026 dividend on its Common Stock in the amount of $0.25 per share at its meeting held on February 4, 2026. The Company will pay this first quarter 2026 dividend on April 14, 2026 to shareholders of record as of March 23, 2026.

raw.headline: Amphenol Announces First Quarter 2026 Dividend

The Company will pay this first quarter 2026 dividend on April 14, 2026 to shareholders of record as of March 23, 2026.

headline: SNAP's Q4 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: SNAP beats Q4 earnings estimates as revenues rise 10% year over year on higher ARPU, Snapchat+ growth and stronger ads.

headline: Amphenol Unites Leadership As AI Data Center Story Expands With M&A
summary: Amphenol (NYSE:APH) has appointed CEO Adam Norwitt as Chairman, following the retirement of long-serving Chairman Martin H. Loeffler. The company reports that its growth is supported by demand linked to AI-driven data center investments. Amphenol is integrating CommScope’s Connectivity and Cable Solutions business, expanding its presence in connectivity and cable markets. Amphenol, a major supplier of interconnect and sensor solutions, now combines its top executive and board leadership...

headline: Corning (GLW) Among Hidden Winners To Watch In AI Investing Space
summary: SUMMARY: The rapid expansion of artificial intelligence is driving an enormous build-out of data centers, with total investment expected to reach unprecedented levels. While major AI companies dominate headlines, much of the real opportunity may lie in less visible businesses that provide the infrastructure behind the scenes. These “glue” companies supply the materials, networking, and ... Corning (GLW) Among Hidden Winners To Watch In AI Investing Space
